keyword_research_summary.methodology: Real-time trend analysis + competitor gap identification

high_value_opportunities.keyword: Nintendo Switch 2 vs Switch OLED comparison
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Switch 2 just released June 2025, massive interest in upgrade decisions. First-mover advantage for comprehensive comparisons.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: RTX 5090 vs RTX 4090 gaming performance 2025
high_value_opportunities.rationale: RTX 5090 launched Jan 2025 at $1999. Gamers deciding if upgrade worth $400 premium. High commercial intent.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: best AI agent tools for business under $100
high_value_opportunities.rationale: 2025 declared 'year of the agent' - 99% of developers exploring AI agents. Budget-conscious businesses seeking affordable solutions.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: Nintendo Switch 2 Mario Kart World bundle worth it
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Limited-time $500 bundle vs $450 console. Time-sensitive purchase decision with clear value proposition.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: RTX 5080 vs RTX 4080 Super performance difference
high_value_opportunities.rationale: RTX 5080 shows only 10% uplift over 4080 Super. Gamers questioning if upgrade worth $999 price tag.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: iPhone 16 vs Samsung Galaxy S25 AI features comparison
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Galaxy AI is polished vs Apple Intelligence still in beta. AI becoming major phone buying factor in 2025.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: best budget smartphone under $500 2025
high_value_opportunities.rationale: OnePlus 13R and Pixel 9a leading budget segment. Strong commercial intent with clear price ceiling.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: AI autonomous agents market size 2025
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Market reaching $43.21B by 2029, 44.8% annual growth. Low competition for in-depth analysis content.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: Nintendo Switch 2 backwards compatibility issues
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Nintendo warns 'certain Switch games may not be supported'. Immediate need for compatibility lists and solutions.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: Sony WH-1000XM6 vs Bose QuietComfort Ultra 2025
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Both launched 2025, $150 cheaper than AirPods Max. Premium ANC headphone battle intensifying.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: best gaming laptop under $1500 RTX 50 series
high_value_opportunities.rationale: New RTX 50-series mobile GPUs launching. Gamers seeking best performance per dollar in mid-range segment.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation explained
high_value_opportunities.rationale: New with RTX 50-series. Nvidia claiming 4090-level performance at $549 with heavy DLSS 4 reliance.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: how to fix Nintendo Switch 2 charging issues
high_value_opportunities.rationale: New hardware always has early adoption issues. Low-competition long-tail troubleshooting opportunity.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: Apple Vision Pro 2 vs Meta Quest 4 comparison
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Vision Pro 2 confirmed Q4 2025 with major price reduction. VR market heating up with clearer value propositions.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: Acer Aspire Go 15 vs ASUS Vivobook 16 budget laptop
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Top budget laptops under $600. Students and professionals seeking best bang-for-buck comparison.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: AI agents vs chatbots difference 2025
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Mass confusion as vendors engage in 'agent washing'. Educational content needed to clarify differences.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: RTX 5070 Ti vs RTX 4070 Ti Super value comparison
high_value_opportunities.rationale: RTX 5070 Ti at $749 Feb 2025 launch. Mid-range GPU buyers evaluating if new generation worth premium.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: best wireless earbuds under $200 2025 tested
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Evergreen high-volume keyword. JBL Endurance Peak 3 and others providing flagship features at budget prices.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: iPhone 17 Air thickness rumors vs iPhone 16
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Apple revealed 'thinnest iPhone ever' - iPhone 17 Air. Early speculation content before competitors saturate.

high_value_opportunities.keyword: spatial computing apps Nintendo Switch 2
high_value_opportunities.rationale: Emerging intersection of spatial computing and gaming. Nintendo's new hardware may support spatial features.

immediate_priority: Nintendo Switch 2 comparison and buying guides
